body_html: The stack trace shows the copy is blocked on something, so the actual problem will be elsewhere. Can you try and run after setting the environment variable CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1? Perhaps this will uncover the underlying call that's the source of this problem...
body_text: The stack trace shows the copy is blocked on something, so the actual problem will be elsewhere. Can you try and run after setting the environment variable CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1? Perhaps this will uncover the underlying call that's the source of this problem...
body: The stack trace shows the copy is blocked on something, so the actual problem will be elsewhere. Can you try and run after setting the environment variable `CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1`? Perhaps this will uncover the underlying call that's the source of this problem...
